universum.studios.android.recycler.helper

Interface ItemDragHelper.DragViewHolder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RecyclerViewItemHelper.InteractiveViewHolder
    Enclosing class:
    ItemDragHelper

    public static interface ItemDragHelper.DragViewHolder
extends RecyclerViewItemHelper.InteractiveViewHolder
    Required interface for all ViewHolders which want to support drag feature for theirs corresponding item views.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDragCanceled()
      This method is never called by the drag helper, but is left here only for convenience.
      void onDragFinished(int fromPosition, int toPosition)
      Called by the drag helper whenever drag gesture for view of this holder is finished.
      void onDragStarted()
      Called by the drag helper whenever drag gesture for view of this holder is started.

      • Methods inherited from interface universum.studios.android.recycler.helper.RecyclerViewItemHelper.InteractiveViewHolder

        getInteractiveView, onDraw, onDrawOver

    • Method Detail

      • onDragStarted

        void onDragStarted()
        Called by the drag helper whenever drag gesture for view of this holder is started.
        See Also:
        onDragFinished(int, int), onDragCanceled(), ItemDragHelper.Callback#onSelectedChanged(RecyclerView.ViewHolder, int)

      • onDragFinished

        void onDragFinished(int fromPosition,
                    int toPosition)
        Called by the drag helper whenever drag gesture for view of this holder is finished.
        Parameters:
        fromPosition - The position from which has been the view holder dragged.
        toPosition - The position at which has been the view holder dropped.
        See Also:
        onDragStarted(), ItemDragHelper.Callback#clearView(RecyclerView, RecyclerView.ViewHolder)

      • onDragCanceled

        void onDragCanceled()
        This method is never called by the drag helper, but is left here only for convenience.
